content.text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.0",
  "units": [
    {
      "unit_id": "u1",
      "title": "SAP AI Core, Launchpad, and Generative AI Hub: From Setup to Advanced Orchestration and Grounding",
      "topics": [
        {"topic_id": "u1_t1_intro_aicore_launchpad", "title": "AI Core/Launchpad Overview and Objectives", "summary": "Introduces SAP AI Core and AI Launchpad capabilities, lifecycle, SDK, AI API, and learning objectives.", "chunk_span": [0, 2]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t2_resource_groups_configs", "title": "Resource Groups and Configurations", "summary": "Explains tenant/resource groups, Git integration, and creating configurations/executables for training.", "chunk_span": [3, 4]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t3_model_deployment_serving", "title": "Model Deployment and Serving at Scale", "summary": "Covers deployment, inference, CPU/GPU scaling on Kubernetes, and serving scenarios.", "chunk_span": [5, 5]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t4_tutorials_transition_llm", "title": "Tutorial Reference and Transition to LLM Fundamentals", "summary": "Links house price tutorial and pivots into LLM fundamentals unit.", "chunk_span": [6, 6]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t5_llm_risks_ethics_strategy", "title": "LLM Benefits, Risks, Ethics, and SAP Strategy", "summary": "Highlights dependencies, scalability, complexity, ethics, and SAP’s GenAI security stance.", "chunk_span": [7, 8]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t6_ideation_to_productization", "title": "Ideation, Validation, and Productization Flow", "summary": "Details collaborating with customers, validation criteria, compliance, and iterative delivery.", "chunk_span": [9, 10]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t7_llm_use_cases_challenges", "title": "LLM Use Cases and Performance Challenges", "summary": "Frames why LLMs underperform and sets stage for optimization techniques.", "chunk_span": [11, 12]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t8_rag_hana_vector_engine", "title": "RAG and SAP HANA Vector Engine", "summary": "Introduces RAG, HANA vector engine capabilities, and vectorized operations.", "chunk_span": [13, 14]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t9_tools_agents_functions_eval", "title": "Agents/Tools Integration and Evaluation Setup", "summary": "Shows agent-function-tool workflow and sets objectives for evaluating LLM outputs.", "chunk_span": [15, 16]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t10_llm_improvement_cycle", "title": "Continuous Improvement and Security", "summary": "Covers domain pretraining, incremental updates, KPIs, monitoring, and LLM app security.", "chunk_span": [17, 18]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t11_genai_hub_overview", "title": "Generative AI Hub Purpose and Role", "summary": "Defines hub need, consolidation of models, compliance, and AI Core/Launchpad integration.", "chunk_span": [19, 20]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t12_btp_setup_and_provision", "title": "BTP Account and AI Core Provisioning", "summary": "Guides global account setup and provisioning AI Core/service keys.", "chunk_span": [21, 21]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t13_beyond_chatbots_use_cases", "title": "Beyond Chatbots: Software-Driven Generative Use Cases", "summary": "Explores non-human-in-the-loop generative outputs and software control scenarios.", "chunk_span": [22, 23]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t14_prompting_json_extraction", "title": "Prompting for JSON Extraction: Urgency and Sentiment", "summary": "Builds prompts to extract urgency and sentiment with strict JSON formatting.", "chunk_span": [24, 27]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t15_prompting_business_categories", "title": "Prompting for Business-Aligned Categories", "summary": "Adds company-aligned categories and iterates prompts for structured outputs.", "chunk_span": [28, 30]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t16_sdk_intro_install", "title": "Generative AI Hub SDK Introduction and Install", "summary": "Explains why SDKs help, problem context, and installation basics.", "chunk_span": [31, 32]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t17_sdk_usage_chat_completion", "title": "SDK Usage: Completions and Chat", "summary": "Demonstrates calling models via SDK proxies for completions/chat.", "chunk_span": [33, 33]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t18_need_orchestration", "title": "Why Orchestration: Managing Multi-Model Workflows", "summary": "Motivates orchestration to reduce redundancy across models and pipelines.", "chunk_span": [34, 35]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t19_orchestration_quickstart_code", "title": "Orchestration Service: Quickstart Code", "summary": "Shows instantiation, running templates, and handling deployments/errors.", "chunk_span": [36, 38]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t20_json_output_generation", "title": "Generating Clean JSON and Consolidating Steps", "summary": "Implements JSON generation and combines steps into consistent pipelines.", "chunk_span": [39, 41]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t21_prompt_eval_with_sdk", "title": "Evaluating Prompts with SDK", "summary": "Builds custom evaluation, compares predictions vs. ground truth, and scales tests.", "chunk_span": [42, 44]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t22_adv_prompt_techniques", "title": "One-/Few-Shot and Metaprompting", "summary": "Explains few-shot and metaprompting; combining techniques for better results.", "chunk_span": [45, 46]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t23_generate_guides_with_metaprompt", "title": "Metaprompting to Derive Classification Guides", "summary": "Creates urgency/sentiment guides from examples and integrates them in prompts.", "chunk_span": [47, 49]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t24_model_selection_rationale", "title": "Why Use Multiple Models", "summary": "Summarizes reasons for multi-model strategies and previews comparisons.", "chunk_span": [50, 50]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t25_launchpad_configs_deployments", "title": "Launchpad Configurations and Deployments", "summary": "Shows configuring and deploying various vendor FMs and using orchestration.", "chunk_span": [51, 51]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t26_model_evaluation_runs", "title": "Evaluating Different LLMs via SDK", "summary": "Runs comparative evaluations across models using generative AI hub SDK.", "chunk_span": [52, 53]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t27_evaluation_summary_recap", "title": "Evaluation Summary and Recap", "summary": "Recaps prompts, SDK, orchestration, and model selection learnings.", "chunk_span": [54, 56]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t28_identify_adv_ai_scenarios", "title": "Identifying Scenarios for Advanced Techniques", "summary": "Outlines business scenarios and the value of the model library.", "chunk_span": [57, 57]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t29_cross_industry_value_props", "title": "Cross-Industry Benefits and Hub Value", "summary": "Details improvements across industries and hub features enabling them.", "chunk_span": [58, 59]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t30_facility_mgmt_challenges", "title": "Facility Management Scenario and Challenges", "summary": "Defines FM scenario needs: grounding, embeddings, privacy, and orchestration.", "chunk_span": [60, 60]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t31_orchestration_need_features", "title": "Orchestration: Need, Features, and Workflow", "summary": "Explains coordination, automation, privacy, grounding, and harmonized APIs.", "chunk_span": [61, 63]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t32_orchestration_workflow_json", "title": "Workflow JSON: Upload/Download and Example", "summary": "Shows editing, importing, and exporting orchestration workflows as JSON.", "chunk_span": [64, 64]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t33_sdk_updates_refs", "title": "SDK Updates and References", "summary": "Provides recent SDK release highlights and documentation links.", "chunk_span": [65, 65]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t34_orchestration_limits_wrap", "title": "Orchestration Limits and Transition to Grounding", "summary": "Notes current limitations (function calling, OSS support) and concludes.", "chunk_span": [66, 66]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t35_grounding_concepts_vector", "title": "Grounding Concepts and HANA Vector Engine", "summary": "Introduces document grounding, embeddings, and HANA vector search functions.", "chunk_span": [67, 67]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t36_grounding_pipeline_arch", "title": "Grounding Architecture and Pipeline", "summary": "Describes document store, ingestion, chunking, embedding, and orchestration.", "chunk_span": [68, 68]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t37_grounding_features_launchpad", "title": "Grounding in Generative AI Hub and Launchpad", "summary": "Covers LLM access, Launchpad integration, indexing into HANA Vector DB.", "chunk_span": [69, 69]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t38_grounding_options_setup", "title": "Grounding Options and Administrative Setup", "summary": "Presents grounding module options and initial admin steps and resources.", "chunk_span": [70, 70]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t39_orchestrated_grounded_prompt", "title": "Grounded Prompt via Orchestration Example", "summary": "Shows orchestration template with system prompt and LLM settings.", "chunk_span": [71, 71]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t40_results_retrieval_context", "title": "Grounded Results and Retrieved Context", "summary": "Demonstrates grounded outputs, retrieved documents, and example issues list.", "chunk_span": [72, 72]},
        {"topic_id": "u1_t41_grounding_summary_outcomes", "title": "Grounding Summary and Business Outcomes", "summary": "Summarizes grounding benefits, abstraction to LLMs, and business impact.", "chunk_span": [73, 73]}
      ]
    }
  ]
}
